description: Scientists have identified 11-million-year-old glass fragments in South Australia that record a massive asteroid impact never before known. Despite the event’s magnitude, the crater remains undiscovered, raising new questions about how often large asteroids have struck Earth and their role in shaping its surface.
title: Mysterious Asteroid Impact Found in Australia, But the Crater is Missing

description: Atharvaa Murali’s Thanal, directed by debutant Ravindra Madhava, is now streaming on Amazon Prime Video after its theatrical release in September 2025. The film follows police recruits trapped in a night of danger and revelation, blending action and emotion. Despite mixed reviews, it stands out for strong performances and visuals.
title: Thanal Comes to OTT: Everything You Need to Know About This Tamil Action Thriller

description: Madam Sengupta is a Bengali crime thriller that follows a cartoonist investigating the murder of her daughter. However, what follows next is a blend of conspiracies, politics, and a series of killings.
title: Madam Sengupta Is Now Streaming: Know Where to Watch This Bangla Crime Thriller

description: AI tools like ChatGPT, Gemini, Grok, Meta AI, and Copilot can now help users create personalised Diwali greeting images with just a text prompt. Each model offers unique strengths, from Gemini’s granular editing and ChatGPT’s efficiency to Grok’s text rendering and Meta AI’s convenience, making it easy to generate festive visuals tailored to your style.
title: Best AI Chatbot to Generate Free Diwali Images: Gemini Nano Banana, ChatGPT, Grok and More

description: Diwali is one of the best times of the year to surprise your loved ones with gifts, but you can take your gifting to the next level this year with tech-savvy presents. Budget 5G smartphones like the Redmi A4 5G and Realme Narzo 80 Lite 5G offer everyday connectivity, while tablets such as the OnePlus Pad Lite and Lenovo Idea Tab are perfect for entertainment. Fitness fans will enjoy smartwatches like the Redmi Watch 5 Lite and Noise Pulse Hyper, and music enthusiasts can groove with OnePlus Nord Buds 3 Pro or Samsung Galaxy Buds Core. These gadgets make thoughtful Diwali 2025 gifts.
title: Diwali 2025 Gift Ideas: Mobile Phones, Tablets, Smartwatches and Wireless Earphones That You Can Give to Your Loved Ones

description: Diwali 2025, celebrated on October 21, marks a time for family reunions, joy, and light-filled festivities. For those far from loved ones, a heartfelt message can bridge the distance. Sending thoughtful Diwali wishes is a simple yet meaningful way to share warmth, happiness, and festive spirit across miles.
title: Diwali 2025 Wishes, Quotes, Images, Wallpapers, WhatsApp & Facebook Status to Share With Friends and Family
